ctx: P:iPad mini 16 GB WI-FI only črn NOV
content:
Prodam popolnoma nov iPad mini, kupljen 23. 7. 2014 v Big Bangu. Sicer je že bil aktiviran, a ni v uporabi. Vse kot ob nakupu, račun. Možen le osebni prevzem v Kranju ali Tržiču ter okolici. Razlog prodaje preko ZS (tablica je seveda brezhibna). CENA JE ZADNJA (kupljen za 310 v gotovini da ne bo kakšnih nepotrebnih asociacij).


Body Dimensions 200 x 134.7 x 7.2 mm (7.87 x 5.30 x 0.28 in)
Weight 308 g (10.86 oz)
Display Type LED-backlit IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors
Size 768 x 1024 pixels, 7.9 inches (~162 ppi pixel density)
Multitouch Yes
Protection Oleophobic coating
Loudspeaker Yes, with stereo speakers
3.5mm jack Yes
Internal 16/32/64 GB, 512 MB RAM
WLAN Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n, dual-band
Bluetooth v4.0, A2DP, EDR
USB v2.0
Camera Primary 5 MP, 2592 х 1944 pixels, autofocus
Features Geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection
Video 1080p@30fps,
Secondary 1.2 MP, 720p@30fps, face detection, FaceTime over Wi-Fi
Features OS iOS 6, upgradable to iOS 7.1.2, planned upgrade to iOS 8
Chipset Apple A5
CPU Dual-core 1 GHz Cortex-A9
GPU PowerVR SGX543MP2
Sensors Accelerometer, gyro, compass
Messaging iMessage, Email, Push Email, IM
Browser HTML (Safari)

- iCloud cloud service
- Twitter and Facebook integration
- Maps
- Audio/video player/editor
- Photo viewer/editor
- Voice memo
- TV-out
- Document viewer
- Predictive text input
Battery Non-removable Li-Po battery (16.3 Wh)

Cena: 240,00 €
author: tado

content: Še vedno na voljo, za dodatne INFO ZS.
